body:
>They rape and assault animals, and often kids too

I'm not defending them, because they *are* degenerate and mentally ill, but my point is that from a moral and philosophical standpoint, they are (very slightly) less bad then pedophiles if they're not pedos themselves.  I'll give the YouTube videos a watch in my free time :)
